channel.title: Lea County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lea County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NM-18 South at NM-128
item.description: NM-18 south at NM-128 in Jal.

item.title: NM-18 South at NM-176
item.description: NM-18 south at NM-176. Continue south on NM-18 for Jal. Turn left on NM-176 for Andrews (TX); left on NM-176 for Eunice.

item.title: NM-18 South Approaching NM-176
item.description: NM-18 south approaching NM-176 in Eunice.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West at NM-18
item.description: US-62/US-180 west at NM-18 junction. Turn right for NM-18 north to Lovington; left for NM-18 south to Eunice. Continue straight for US-62/US-180 to Carlsbad.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 west at the Texas state line.

item.title: US-62/US-180 East - Leaving New Mexico
item.description: You Are Now Leaving New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 east. Taken at the New Mexico/Texas State Line.

item.title: End NM-218 at US-62
item.description: End NM-218 east at US-62. Turn right for US-62 west to Hobbs; left for US-62 east to Seminole (TX).

item.title: NM-18 South at NM-218/NM-132
item.description: NM-18 south at NM-218/NM-132 junction (Dal Paso St.) in Hobbs.

item.title: NM-18 South at NM-132/NM-218
item.description: NM-18 south at NM-132/NM-218. Turn right on NM-18 south for Eunice; continue straight on NM-218 east for Seminole, TX.

item.title: NM-18 South at Bender St.
item.description: NM-18 south (Lovington Highway) at Bender St. Turn left on Bender St. to continue south on NM-18, and for Eunice, and Seminole, TX.

item.title: NM-18 South - Bender St.
item.description: NM-18 south (Lovington Highway) at Bender St. Turn left on Bender St. to continue south on NM-18.

item.title: US-82 East at 17th St.
item.description: US-82 east at 17th St., the truck around around Lovington. Turn right for NM-18 South/NM-83 East truck route; turn left for US-82 east truck route. Entering Lovington, New Mexico. Lovington is the seat of Lea County.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching Truck Route
item.description: US-82 east approaching truck route around the city of Lovington. Turn right on 17th St. for the NM-18/NM-83 truck route. Turn left on 17th St. for the US-82 truck route.

item.title: US-82 East at NM-238 South
item.description: US-82 east at NM-238 south.

item.title: US-82 East Approaching NM-238
item.description: US-82 east approaching NM-238 south.

item.title: End NM-457 South at US-380
item.description: End NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right for US-82 west to Artesia; left for US-82 east to Lovington.

item.title: NM-457 North
item.description: NM-457 north in Lea County.

item.title: End NM-457 South at US-82
item.description: End NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right on US-82 west to Artesia; left on US-82 east to Lovington.

item.title: NM-457 South at US-82
item.description: NM-457 south at US-82. Turn right on US-82 (west) for Artesia; left on US-82 (east) for Lovington.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-457
item.description: US-380 east at NM-457 south.

item.title: US-380 East - Lea County Line
item.description: Lea County Line on US-380 east.
